articles.title: JUST IN | Gunmen mow down six people in KZN mass murder
articles.description: Police are searching for four gunmen who shot and killed six people while they were trying to locate an ID belonging to one of the assailants in Umlazi on Friday night.
articles.content:
Police are searching for four gunmen who shot and killed six people at Q section in Umlazi, KwaZulu-Natal, on Friday night.

articles.title: Family Feud contestant who joked about marriage on air gets life in prison for wife's murder
